The Yeoman Monthly Digest #1

By Addy Osmani
Published: November 07, 2013
Updated: November 07, 2013
Comments: 0
Your browser may not support the functionality in this article.

Allo’ Allo’. Welcome to the first issue of the Yeoman monthly digest - a regular round-up of community articles, videos and talks to help you stay on top of what’s new with your favourite man-in-a-hat. We hope you find the articles, videos and updates below helpful!

Articles

  • Building Web Apps With Yeoman And Polymer [html5rocks.com]
  • Introducing a Yeoman Generator For Full-stack Angular + Express Development [tylerHenkel.com]
  • Column: A Yeoman Generator Built for Hackathons [movefastbreakthings.ca]
  • Working With Angular, Rails and Yeoman [rockyj.in]
  • Building Chrome Apps With Yeoman [alolo.co]
  • Migration to Jekyll: My Journey to Understanding Yeoman [davidCalhoun.me]
  • CoffeeScript Source Maps With Yeoman [mikeFowler.me]
  • Why I Generate My Apps With Yeoman [danRistic.com]
  • An Interview With The Creator Of The Hoodie Generator For Yeoman [hood.ie]
  • Articles In The Wiki [github.com/yeoman]

Slides

  • Automating Development Workflow (with Yo, Grunt, Bower and more) [html5rocks.com]
  • Front-end Tooling Workflows [speakerdeck.com/dmosher]
  • Modern Workflows For Modern WebApps [slid.es/passy]

Videos

  • Introduction to the MEAN Stack [youtube.com]
  • ‘yo dude’ a talk on Yeoman and Cordova from IBM [youtube.com]
  • IBM Worklight generators for Yeoman “Part 1](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x9I9dKC2BGU, “Part 2](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hRXmcnukIz8, “Part 3](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-qmB69gefIc) [youtube.com]
  • Intro to Yeoman sub-generators [youtube.com]
  • Getting started with Yeoman and generator-webapp [youtube.com]
  • Yeoman generator for Twitter Bootstrap [youtube.com]

Generator updates

  • Bones - a Yeoman generator for basic web projects [github.com/matt-bailey]
  • Generator MEAN - scaffolding for Mongo, Express, Angular and Node [github.com/jrcryer]
  • Generator for Cordova [github.com/btholt]
  • Genesis Wordpress - WordPress + Vagrant + Multi-env scaffolding [github.com/genesis]
  • Generator for Bespoke.js [github.com/markdagleish]
  • Generator for Reveal [github.com/slara]
  • (Official) Backbone generator 0.2.1 is now out [github.com/yeoman]
  • AngularJS generator v0.5.0/v0.5.1 out [github.com/yeoman]
  • Another Yeoman generator for Backbone and RequireJS [github.com/reintroducing]

If there are Yeoman resources you would like to suggest for the next issue, please feel free to suggest them to @yeoman on Twitter or +Yeoman on Plus and we’ll be sure to check em’ out.
